metadata.feature_description: Manage post authors, change authorship, and filter content by author

steps.action: Navigate to News page with Publisher module
steps.expected: Authors filter widget visible in right pane
steps.actual: Authors filter widget visible showing 'Authors:' heading with SuperUser Account (2) and Test User2 (1)

steps.action: Click on Test User2 in the Authors filter
steps.expected: Posts filtered to show only posts by Test User2
steps.actual: URL changed to ?author=7, posts filtered correctly showing only Test User2's posts with 'Viewing: Test User2' indicator

steps.action: Navigate to post edit mode for a post by Test User2
steps.actual: Change Author panel visible showing 'Post Author: Test User2' with table headers: Name, Email, Joined
Authors list populated with one author (Test User2) showing display name, username, email, and join date

steps.action: Open Change Author panel and attempt to change author
steps.expected: Multiple authors available to select from, allowing author change
steps.actual: Only current author (Test User2) appears in the list. Cannot change author because no other users have explicit module permissions.

issues: Only one author (Test User2) available in the Change Author panel because authors are determined by explicit module permissions. SuperUser Account has implicit superuser access but does not appear in the permission-based author list.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Author sorting in Change Author panel

steps.expected: Sort indicator appears on Name column
steps.actual: Sort indicator (arrow) visible on Name column header
Sort indicator moved to Email column header, no errors occurred

steps.action: Examine author information in Change Author panel
steps.expected: Display name and username shown correctly
steps.actual: Author row shows: Avatar, Display Name (Test User2), Username (testuser2), Email (testuser2@test.com), Join Date (12/30/2025)

steps.expected: Email should be a mailto link
steps.actual: Email address is a clickable mailto link (mailto:testuser2@test.com)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Author Filter widget displays post counts

steps.action: View Authors filter widget on News page
steps.expected: Author names with post counts displayed
steps.actual: Authors filter shows: SuperUser Account (2), Test User2 (1) - correctly reflecting the number of published posts per author

observations: Authors in the Change Author panel are determined by explicit module permissions (AllowAccess in ModulePermissionController), not by user roles or superuser status.

SuperUser Account does not appear in the Change Author list because they have implicit superuser access rather than explicit module permissions. This is by design based on the AuthorManager.GetAuthors() implementation.
The Author Filter widget (AuthorFilter.ascx) correctly counts and displays all post authors regardless of permissions.
Pagination in Author Filter was not testable due to insufficient number of authors (only 2 authors with posts).
Search functionality for authors was not found in the Change Author panel UI - the code shows sorting but no search feature.
Author profile information view is not a dedicated feature - author info is displayed inline on posts (avatar, name, 'More from this author' link).
